db:abstract.db:para: The Logfile Position Source shows how to create and work with a custom NMEA position source, for platforms without GPS.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = logfilepositionsource QT = positioning core widgets
HEADERS = logfilepositionsource.h \ clientapplication.h SOURCES = logfilepositionsource.cpp \ clientapplication.cpp \ main.cpp
RESOURCES += \ logfile.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/positioning/logfilepositionsource INSTALLS += target
